txt.en: 'The Easterlings have set up a camp across the river north-east of here. This would not normally be troubling, as the river's current is swift and unforgiving, but this one is placed near a safe crossing. My scouts have also reported seeing several Carg√ªl amongst the warriors. These foul creatures follow and serve the darkest and most powerful of the Enemy's leaders. Their presence troubles me greatly.'
What can you tell me about the Ford?
